name: Organic Website
description: A clean and eco-friendly website promoting organic products, sustainable farming, and healthy living. It includes a product catalog, blogs, and educational content on organic practices, with a nature-inspired design that emphasizes trust and transparency.

name: Travel Website
description: An all-in-one travel platform with destination guides, booking tools, and user stories. It helps travelers plan trips with detailed itineraries, maps, and real-time travel info, wrapped in a sleek, mobile-friendly interface.

name: Restaurant Website
description: A stylish website for restaurants featuring online menus, reservations, and food ordering. It includes chef profiles, customer reviews, and event updates, designed to enhance the digital dining experience.
